nodes.bodyText: I'm not sure about this change, DMN supports multiple PMML implementation so we should not have an hard link with a specific impl but we should find a way to decouple it (/cc @tarilabs )

nodes.bodyText: I concur, when I spoke with @gitgabrio I suggested to make the change in this interface, which is good, but I suggested to investigate if possible to avoid having the String sanitizedKieBase parameter at least. O/w this shall be renamed something like getPMMLTrustyRuntime();
